actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Cuyahoga Valley National Historical Park and Recreation Area.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of the Cuyahoga alley National Historical Park and Recreation Area between Cleveland and Akron, Ohio. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire necessary land, and to administer the Park. Establishes the Cuyahoga Valley National Park and Recreation Commission to assist the Secretary in his responsibilities under this Act. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Cuyahoga Valley National Historical Park and Recreation Area.
